html:
2025-0674
2025-09-18PS, EPCREmergency Management ActProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 284, British Columbia Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 284 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to British Columbia with respect to the rainstorm that occurred from October 18 to October 20, 2024.N/A
subject: Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 284, British Columbia
precis: Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 284 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to British Columbia with respect to the rainstorm that occurred from October 18 to October 20, 2024.
